value.title: AWS DeepRacer device software now open source

value.title: Lyft sells self-driving unit to Toyota’s Woven Planet for $550M
value.excerpt: Ride-hailing company Lyft has sold off its autonomous vehicle unit to Toyota’s Woven Planet Holdings subsidiary for $550 million, the latest in a string of acquisitions spurred by the cost and lengthy timelines to commercialize autonomous vehicle technology.

value.title: Waymo’s leadership shift spotlights self-driving car challenges
value.excerpt: Waymo's recent executive shuffle signals driverless technology has a ways to go before a robust self-driving car industry becomes reality.

value.title: Explaining Why Explainable AI (XAI) Is Needed For Autonomous Vehicles And Especially Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Explainable AI (XAI) is going to be vital for Autonomous Vehicles (AVs) and will be first expected in self-driving cars, providing explanations about the driving journey.

value.title: EU outlines ambitious artificial intelligence regulations focused on risky uses
